bradleyross.library.helpers

Class ExceptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.library.helpers.ExceptionHelper

  • public class ExceptionHelper
extends Object
    An attempt to write a generic exception logger that will provide both the location of the exception and the location of the log request.

    The following is a sample log using this class.
